channel.title: Comments on: No need to understand how everything works

item.title: By: mimoYmima
item.dc:creator: mimoYmima
item.description: Yeah I think that's coming in the next version of the MacBook :D
item.content:encoded: Yeah I think that's coming in the next version of the MacBook ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Roi Suman
item.dc:creator: Roi Suman
item.description: One of the main differences there is that computers need <a href="http://www.signalandpower.com/Power-Cords/" rel="nofollow">Power Cords</a> in one way or another to keep them running. We just need food for us to keep going.
item.content:encoded: One of the main differences there is that computers need Power Cords in one way or another to keep them running. We just need food for us to keep going.
